+@name: Imōto no o Shigoto wa Jikyū 2000-en

info.+content: Imōto no o Shigoto wa Jikyū 2000-en
妹のおシゴトは時給2000円

High school girl Meiko Kenmochi is lured by a mysterious job ad offering high pay to work as a "sister." Meiko is always broke because she is taking care of relatives. She can't hang out with friends, she can't keep up with trends, and she's beginning to spiral into a crisis because she has to continually turn down invitations because of her finances. This dubious opportunity to work as a "sister" might just be her escape rope.

news.+content: <cite>Missions of Love's</cite> Toyama Starts <cite>Imōto no o Shigoto wa Jikyū 2000-en</cite> Manga
